Articles.Content: When ever I launch a rocket, no matter the rocket or the engine I put on it, and only during the main stage fireing their is a soft clicking sound off in the back round. I was just wondering if anyone else notice that and why it was their.
Pretty sure it's just the staging noise, linked to the UI (literally, whenever you press space)

When ever I launch a rocket, no matter the rocket or the engine I put on it, and only during the main stage fireing their is a soft clicking sound off in the back round. I was just wondering if anyone else notice that and why it was their.

You could be hearing a loop in the rocket sound effect. You may just be very sensitive to it.

Could you post a video?

Maybe there are launch clamps on the runway? I think every time they are loaded, they make that "cachunk" noise.

Edited March 13, 2015 by Rthsom
Are you using atmospheric sound enhancement? I had this as an issue when I installed it in v0.90.
Or,,, might you have an engine on board that is deprived of fuel? Not really a "click" but more like a "clack".
